abstract: So far, only the United States has significantly exploited natural gas reserves in shale. But Sinopec, the Chinese oil giant, is showing signs of interest.
snippet: So far, only the United States has significantly exploited natural gas reserves in shale. But Sinopec, the Chinese oil giant, is showing signs of interest.
lead_paragraph: China has a chance of challenging the United States for shale supremacy. So far, only the United States has significantly exploited domestic reserves of shale gas. But Sinopec, China’s major state-run oil company, is now taking shale seriously and lacks many of the roadblocks that have held back developers in other countries.

headline.main: China Challenges U.S. Supremacy in Shale Gas
headline.print_headline: China Is Serious About Shale Gas
